detail_description: Lagoa de Conceicao, located in Florianopolis, is a vibrant and developed area that offers a variety of activities for visitors. Along the lakefront, there are numerous restaurants and nightlife options to enjoy. During the day, the lagoon provides opportunities for water sports such as jet skiing, stand up paddleboarding, and kayaking. Additionally, Cafe Cultura in the town center is a popular spot for digital nomads or anyone looking for a great coffee with a fantastic atmosphere.
name: Lagoa
address: Florianópolis - State of Santa Catarina, Brazil

excerpt: Barra da Lagoa is a small fishing village in the city of Florianópolis, Santa Catarina, Brazil. The village is set on the mouth of a tidewater channel that flows in and out of the Island's sizable lagoon, the Lagoa da Conceição. Wikipedia.
detail_description: Barra da Lagoa is a charming fishing village located in Florianópolis, Santa Catarina, Brazil. Situated at the mouth of a tidal channel leading to the Lagoa da Conceição, this small town offers a picturesque setting where the river meets the ocean. Visitors can enjoy a relaxing day on the beautiful beach and then take a leisurely stroll along the footpath to reach natural pools nestled at the end of a trail.
name: Barra da Lagoa
address: Florianópolis - State of Santa Catarina, Brazil

excerpt: Florianópolis, the capital of southern Brazil’s Santa Catarina state, is made up mostly of 54km-long Santa Catarina Island. It's famous for its beaches, including popular resort areas such as Praia dos Ingleses at the island's northern tip. Its Lagoa da Conceição, a saltwater lagoon, is popular for windsurfing and boating. The Pedro Ivo Campos Bridge connects the island to a mainland commercial district.
detail_description: Florianópolis, the capital of Santa Catarina state in southern Brazil, is a stunning destination known for its 54km-long Santa Catarina Island and beautiful beaches. The island offers popular resort areas like Praia dos Ingleses and features the Lagoa da Conceição, a saltwater lagoon perfect for windsurfing and boating. The city also boasts a vibrant nightlife scene and rich cultural history to explore.
name: Florianópolis
address: State of Santa Catarina, Brazil

excerpt:
Santo Antônio de Lisboa is a district of the city of Florianópolis, the state capital of Santa Catarina in Brazil.
It is known for having strong Azorian culture due to the immigration in the 19th century.
The seat of the district is Santo Antônio de Lisboa. Wikipedia.
detail_description: Santo Antônio de Lisboa, located in Florianópolis, Brazil, is a district with a rich Azorean cultural heritage stemming from 19th-century immigration. The district's seat is also named Santo Antônio de Lisboa and it offers visitors a glimpse into the area's historical and cultural significance.
name: Santo Antônio de Lisboa
address: Florianópolis - State of Santa Catarina, Brazil

excerpt: Remote beach with footpath access, surrounded by mountains & designated a nature conservation site.
detail_description: Lagoinha do Leste Beach is a remote and stunning natural haven located in Florianopolis, Brazil. Accessible only by foot or boat, this hidden gem is nestled between two mountains and designated as a nature conservation site. A two-hour trek through rugged rainforest leads to warm lagoons and a pristine stretch of golden sand beach.
name: Lagoinha do Leste Beach
address: State of Santa Catarina, Brazil

excerpt: A popular spot for local surfers, this picturesque area offers a white sand beach & food vendors.
detail_description: Joaquina Beach is a popular spot for local surfers and offers a picturesque setting with white sand and food vendors. It's known for its perfect waves that attract surfers, as well as its high dunes at the back of the beach where visitors can try sandboarding. The area also features other beaches catering to different preferences, such as Campeche Beach, which is ideal for a dream surf vacation and offers stunning views of Campeche Island.
name: Joaquina Beach
address: State of Santa Catarina, Brazil

excerpt: Traffic bridge opened in 1982 to link the island of Santa Catarina to the mainland.
detail_description: Ponte Hercílio Luz, a traffic bridge that was opened in 1982, serves as a significant link between the island of Santa Catarina and the mainland. This suspension bridge, completed in 1926, holds historical importance as it was the first to connect these two points. With its central span stretching around 340 meters (1,115 feet), it ranked among the world's top 100 largest bridges of its kind.
name: Ponte Hercílio Luz
address: Ponte pênsil, Centro, Florianópolis - SC, 88010-400, Brazil

excerpt: Jurerê is a beach-side neighbourhood on the northern shore of the island of Florianópolis in Santa Catarina, Brazil. The Jurerê Internacional resort is located in Jurerê. Wikipedia.
detail_description: Jurerê is a trendy beach-side neighborhood situated on the northern coast of Florianópolis in Santa Catarina, Brazil. It encompasses the upscale Jurerê Internacional resort, known for its modern and luxurious atmosphere. The area offers a mix of shopping, vibrant nightlife, elegant villas, and exclusive beach clubs.
name: Jurerê
address: Florianópolis - State of Santa Catarina, Brazil

detail_description: Praia Brava, a picturesque coastal destination, boasts stunning sandy beaches and breathtaking ocean views. Situated in a secluded region, this tranquil haven offers an array of recreational activities for visitors to enjoy. With its pristine shores and crystal-clear waters, Praia Brava is ideal for swimming, sunbathing, and beachcombing. The area's unspoiled natural beauty attracts nature enthusiasts who can explore the nearby forests and wildlife reserves.
name: Praia Brava
address: Florianópolis - State of Santa Catarina, Brazil

detail_description: Ribeirão da Ilha offers a variety of unique experiences for visitors. You can participate in a clay sculpting workshop, spend a day with local fishermen, learn traditional wool spinning and dyeing techniques, or make berimbaus used in capoeira. The Oyster Experience is also popular, including a visit to an oyster farm, cooking classes for oyster dishes, and visits to local museums.
name: Ribeirão da Ilha
address: Florianópolis - State of Santa Catarina, Brazil

excerpt: Verdant island off the coast of Florianópolis features numerous ancient archeological sites.
detail_description: Campeche Island, located off the coast of Florianópolis, is a treasure trove of ancient archaeological sites and natural beauty. The island is known for its pristine sands, calm waters, and hidden coves that offer stunning views of cliffs and rock formations. Visitors can join organized boat tours departing from Armacao Beach to explore the island's clear waters and preserved natural park.
name: Campeche Island
address: State of Santa Catarina, Brazil

excerpt: Large, bustling beach with nearby amenities like hotels & restaurants, plus waves for surfing.
detail_description: Praia dos Ingleses is a lively and popular beach with plenty of amenities such as hotels, restaurants, and supermarkets nearby. It's known for its surfing waves, making it a great spot for water sports enthusiasts. The area is recommended by expats as a good place to raise children, with several neighborhoods on the island offering safety and access to quality schools.
name: Praia dos Ingleses
address: State of Santa Catarina, Brazil

excerpt: Protected stretch of sand overlooking Campeche Island, known for laid-back surf culture & bar scene.
detail_description: Campeche is a stunning destination known for its laid-back surf culture, vibrant bar scene, and a protected stretch of sand that offers breathtaking views of Campeche Island. The beach boasts 5 kilometers of pristine white sand and crystal-clear waters with emerald hues. Over the years, it has seen significant development with the addition of fine homes and buildings, making it one of the most sought-after beaches in Floriano.
name: Campeche
address: State of Santa Catarina, Brazil

excerpt: 1908 Catholic church with twin towers, stained-glass windows, frescoes & statuary.
detail_description: The Catedral Metropolitana de Florianópolis Nossa Senhora Do Desterro e Santa Catarina De Alexandria is a stunning Catholic church with a rich history dating back to the 18th century. Situated on the site of an older chapel from 1679, this cathedral boasts historic architecture, including twin towers and intricate stained-glass windows.
name: Catedral Metropolitana de Florianópolis Nossa Senhora Do Desterro e Santa Catarina De Alexandria
address: R. Padre Miguelinho, 55 - Centro, Florianópolis - SC, 88010-102, Brazil

excerpt: Recreational beach featuring warm sands, rocky surrounding cliffs & ocean waves for surfing.
detail_description: Praia do Santinho is a recreational beach known for its warm sands, rocky cliffs, and strong ocean waves that are perfect for surfing. Visitors adore this beach for its clear waters and fun yet powerful waves, making it important to be cautious with children. The pleasant temperature and clean fine sand provide a great area to spend the day. There are various vendors and restaurants with restrooms available, as well as public bathrooms. Lifeguards are always attentive to swimmers' safety.
name: Praia do Santinho
address: Santinho, State of Santa Catarina, Brazil

excerpt: Canasvieiras is a neighbourhood and beach located in southern Brazil, approximately 27 kilometres north-east of the city of Florianópolis on the northern part of Santa Catarina Island. Nearby beaches include Jurerê and Cachoeira do Bom Jesus. Wikipedia.
detail_description: Canasvieiras is a bustling neighborhood and beach situated in the southern part of Brazil, just about 27 kilometers northeast of Florianópolis on Santa Catarina Island. It's known for its proximity to other beaches like Jurerê and Cachoeira do Bom Jesus. The area is popular with Argentinian visitors and offers a lively atmosphere during the summer months.
name: Canasvieiras
address: Florianópolis - State of Santa Catarina, Brazil

excerpt: Hilltop fortress built in the 18th century, with historical artifacts & a picturesque ocean view.
detail_description: São José da Ponta Grossa Fortress, a hilltop stronghold constructed in the 18th century, offers a glimpse into Brazil's coastal defense history. Located near picturesque beaches like Jurere and Praia do Forte, this historical site was declared a heritage site in 1938. The fortress is part of the network of major forts around Florianopolis, including Nossa Senhora da Conceicao, Santo Antonio, and Santana.
name: São José da Ponta Grossa Fortress
address: Serv. da Carioca, s/n - Praia do Forte, Florianópolis - SC, 88010-000, Brazil

excerpt: Large public market with shops selling fish & prepared food, plus restaurants & bars.
detail_description: The Mercado Público de Florianópolis is a historic market that offers an authentic experience for both locals and visitors. It's not just a place to shop, but also a vibrant meeting point where one can immerse in the local culture. The market features a variety of products including fresh seafood, which is essential to the island's cuisine.
name: Mercado Público de Florianópolis
address: R. Jerônimo Coelho, 60 - Centro, Florianópolis - SC, 88010-030, Brazil

detail_description: Praça XV de Novembro is a historic square located in the heart of downtown. It's surrounded by beautiful colonial buildings and has a charming atmosphere. The square is known for its iconic fig tree, which is over 150 years old and provides a picturesque backdrop for visitors taking leisurely strolls or enjoying outdoor events. With its central location, Praça XV de Novembro is a popular meeting spot for locals and tourists alike, offering a glimpse into the city's rich history and vibrant culture.
name: Praça XV de Novembro
address: Centro, Florianópolis - SC, 88010-400, Brazil

excerpt: Sheltered sandy beach with a couple of simple cafes, accessible on foot via a bridge & a trail.
detail_description: Matadeiro Beach is a secluded sandy beach accessible by foot via a bridge and trail. The hike can be started from Pantano do Sul or Matadeiro, leading through the Atlantic rainforest along a cliff. The beach offers stunning natural scenery with rock cliffs, green hills, a freshwater lagoon for swimming, and emerald ocean for surfing. Accessing the beach requires navigating through Praia da Armacao and crossing a bridge or walking during low tide.
name: Matadeiro Beach
address: State of Santa Catarina, Brazil

excerpt: Sweeping white sandy beach known for its historic shipwrecks & 19th century lighthouse.
detail_description: Praia de Naufragados is a stunning white sandy beach located at the far south end of Santa Catarina island. Accessible via the Naufragados trail, this isolated beach offers a glimpse of pristine natural beauty. The trek through the Atlantic rainforest takes about 45 minutes and leads to a secure and untouched sector, making it an immaculate example of the island's charm.
name: Praia de Naufragados
address: State of Santa Catarina, Brazil

excerpt: Long sand beach & popular surfing spot with scenic headlands at either end & casual bars.
detail_description: Mole Beach, also known as Praia Mole, is a popular surfing spot with a long stretch of sand and scenic headlands at either end. It's a favorite among locals and tourists for surfing competitions and enjoying the sun and water.
name: Mole Beach
address: State of Santa Catarina, Brazil

excerpt: Sandboarding is a popular activity on these expansive dunes with scenic ocean views.
detail_description: The Dunes of Joaquina in Florianopolis, Brazil are famous for their expansive white sand and the opportunity to go sandboarding with stunning ocean views. Visitors can rent or buy boards from nearby shops or join locals for this popular activity. Situated between Mole Beach and Ponta do Retiro, these dunes offer panoramic views of the ocean and Lagoa da Conceicao. Nearby attractions include Natural pools of Barra da Lagoa and Mole Beach.
name: Dunes of Joaquina
address: Lagoa da Conceição, Florianópolis - SC, Brazil

excerpt: This large, stately 18th-century palace is now a museum with historic artwork & furniture.
detail_description: Palacio Cruz e Sousa, also known as the Pink Palace, is a grand 18th-century building that has been transformed into a museum showcasing historic artwork and furniture. Originally serving as a seat of government, this museum offers fascinating insights into the history of the State of Santa Catarina. The striking architecture and vibrant colors make it an ideal spot for photography enthusiasts. While some find the art depicting mistreatment of natives disturbing, it serves as a poignant reminder of historical events.
name: Palacio Cruz e Sousa
address: Palácio Cruz e Sousa, Praça XV de Novembro, 227 - Centro, Florianópolis - SC, 88010-400, Brazil

excerpt: Former military fortress & quarantine, this elevated landmark offers views & 2 batteries of cannons.
detail_description: Fortaleza de Santo Antonio de Ratones is a former military fortress and quarantine site that offers stunning views and features two batteries of cannons. It is a popular stop on the 'pirate' boat trip, offering visitors a chance to explore its rich history and enjoy beautiful panoramic views. The fort's elevated location provides an awesome vantage point for taking in the surrounding scenery.
name: Fortaleza de Santo Antonio de Ratones
address: Ilha de Ratones Grande s/n, Baía Norte, Florianópolis - SC, 88000-000, Brazil

excerpt: Coastal island with dense jungle, popular beaches, a national park & protected mangrove areas.
detail_description: Santa Catarina Island is a coastal paradise with lush jungles, beautiful beaches, and protected mangrove areas. The island offers a rich cultural experience at the Santa Catarina History Museum, housed in the stunning Palace Cruz e Souza. Visitors can explore intricate 19th-century marquetry and paintings of Desterro while learning about the island's history.
name: Santa Catarina Island
address: Florianópolis - State of Santa Catarina, Brazil

detail_description: Ingleses Norte is a popular destination known for its beautiful sand dunes, particularly the Dunas da Joaca. These dunes are a haven for sandboarding enthusiasts and stretch from the south shore of Lagoa da Conceicao to Ingleses Norte. Visitors can hire boards on weekends and holidays to experience the thrill of sandboarding down the picturesque dunes.
name: Ingleses Norte
address: Florianópolis - State of Santa Catarina, Brazil

detail_description: Bar do Arante is a unique beachside restaurant in Florianopolis, Brazil, known for its fresh seafood dishes and perfectly mixed caipirinhas. The tradition of covering the walls and ceiling with handwritten notes dates back to the 1970s when students from Sao Paulo and Rio Grande do Sul frequented Pantano do Sul beach. Customers are encouraged to leave their mark by hanging slips of paper on the walls, creating an intriguing visual display.
name: Bar do Arante
address: R. Abelardo Otacílio Gomes, 254 - Pântano do Sul, Florianópolis - SC, 88067-100, Brazil

detail_description: Pantano do Sul is a stunning destination for seafood enthusiasts, offering a unique blend of beautiful beaches, lush mountains, and charming restaurants. This tropical paradise is known for its unreal seafood tours and picturesque surroundings. Despite its somewhat swampy nature, Pantano do Sul exudes an undeniable allure that attracts visitors seeking a memorable coastal experience.
name: Pantano do Sul
address: Florianópolis - State of Santa Catarina, Brazil

detail_description: Daniela is known for its 3.5km stretch of beautiful, secluded beach, perfect for watching the sunset over Florianopolis. It's a peaceful destination popular with older vacationers. The southern part of the beach features mangroves where the Ratones River meets the sea, but swimming here can be risky due to strong currents.
name: Daniela
address: Florianópolis - State of Santa Catarina, Brazil

detail_description: Conceição Lagoon, also known as Lagoa da Conceicao, is a popular spot in Florianopolis for stand-up paddleboarding (SUP) and other water activities. It's surrounded by famous beaches like Campeche, Jurere, and Barra da Lagoa. The lagoon area is a hub of activity with trendy bars and restaurants, making it the hip district of the Island of Magic. Nature lovers can enjoy jungle trekking and sand dunes nearby.
name: Conceição lagoon
address: R. Sen. Ivo D Aquino, 33 - Loja 3 - Lagoa da Conceição, Florianópolis - SC, 88062-050, Brazil

detail_description: Dunas da Joaquina is a must-visit destination for adventure seekers and nature enthusiasts. Visitors can enjoy the thrill of sandboarding on the impressive dunes, offering a unique and exciting experience. For those who prefer leisurely activities, taking a long walk across the sandy landscape to reach the beach is an option. The area provides ample opportunities for fun and excitement, making it an excellent choice for outdoor enthusiasts looking to explore vast sand dunes in a beautiful natural setting.
name: Dunas da Joaquina
address: Av. das Rendeiras, 748 - Lagoa da Conceição, Florianópolis - SC, Brazil

detail_description: Located in the northern part of the island, Parque Mun. da Lagoa do Peri is a picturesque destination with Praia da Lagoinha, where a traditional fishing community resides and tranquil shallow waters stretch along the coast.
name: Parque Mun. da Lagoa do Peri
address: Rod. Francisco Thomaz dos Santos - Pântano do Sul, Florianópolis - SC, 88066-000, Brazil

excerpt: Small, secluded cove, known as an LGBT-friendly & clothing-optional beach & surfing destination.
detail_description: Praia da Galheta is a small, secluded cove located on the east side of Santa Catarina Island in Florianopolis, Brazil. Accessible only by trails from Praia Mole or Barra da Lagoa, this beach is known for its LGBT-friendly and clothing-optional atmosphere. Naturism has been allowed here since 1997 and it's a popular destination for surfers.
name: Praia da Galheta
address: State of Santa Catarina, Brazil

detail_description: Mirante do Morro da Lagoa da Conceição is a must-visit lookout point that offers a postcard-worthy view of both sides of the lagoon, the dunes of Joaquina, and beyond. In the early morning, visitors can observe fishermen heading out in their boats while waiters prepare for the day ahead. The area offers shade and sometimes even a cart selling fresh coconut water.
name: Mirante do Morro da Lagoa da Conceição
address: Lagoa da Conceição, Florianópolis - SC, 88062-001, Brazil

excerpt: Large waves draw surfers to this public beach known for its clear waters & striking landscape.
detail_description: Praia Brava is a 1.5 km long public beach located in the north of the island, between Praia da Lagoinha and Praia dos Ingleses. It faces northwest-southeast and is surrounded by cliffs, making it an open ocean with clear waters and wild waves that are perfect for surfing, body boarding, and stand-up paddleboarding. During the summer months, there are food tents on the beach to serve visitors.
name: Praia Brava
address: State of Santa Catarina, Brazil

excerpt: Conservation land offering ecological trails through lush rain forests & restinga, plus campsites.
detail_description: Rio Vermelho State Park, also known as Parque Florestal do Rio Vermelho, is a conservation area with ecological trails that wind through lush rainforests and restinga. The park offers guided tours where visitors can learn about the animals being rehabilitated. While the boardwalk is well-made and picturesque, it's important to bring bug spray due to the presence of mosquitoes. The park is home to a variety of wild species, making it an ideal spot for nature enthusiasts.
name: Rio Vermelho State Park
address: Rod. João Gualberto Soares, s/n - São João do Rio Vermelho, Florianópolis - SC, 88010-102, Brazil

detail_description: Fundação Projeto TAMAR Florianópolis is a must-visit destination, especially for families and those interested in marine conservation. Located in the beautiful town of Barra da Lagoa, this organization rescues and cares for injured sea turtles. Visitors can witness these magnificent creatures up close, take guided tours to learn about the organization's work, and even participate in turtle feedings.
name: Fundação Projeto TAMAR Florianópolis
address: R. Prof. Ademir Francisco, s/n - Barra da Lagoa, Florianópolis - SC, 88061-170, Brazil

detail_description: Morro da Cruz is a popular viewpoint in Florianopolis that offers stunning panoramic views of the city, the ocean, and the surrounding areas. It is a great spot to visit during the day or evening to witness the changing colors of the city as the sun sets. If you don't have a car, you can easily catch a taxi to reach the top of the hill.
name: Morro da Cruz
address: Florianópolis - State of Santa Catarina, Brazil

excerpt: Whimsical water park featuring attractions for all ages, including water slides & splash pads.
detail_description: Show Water Park is a delightful destination for visitors of all ages, offering an array of water slides and splash pads. Nestled near the Atlantic Forest park, it provides access to attractions like the Ratones Ecological Trail and the photographic exhibition 'Santo Antonio de Ratones Fortress Memory.' The park also features the Sao Jose da Ponta Grossa Fortress, a captivating 18th-century construction with multiple levels.
name: Show Water Park
address: Rodovia Armando Calil Bullos, SC-403, 3868 - Ingleses Norte, Florianópolis - SC, 88058-000, Brazil

excerpt: Long-established complex with retail shops, a variety of restaurants & a movie theater.
detail_description: Beiramar Shopping is a well-established complex located in the heart of Florianopolis, offering a wide range of retail shops, diverse dining options, and a movie theater. It is renowned for its beautiful structure and houses numerous international and national brands, ensuring a vast variety of products to cater to different tastes and styles. With 210 stores, this popular shopping destination provides convenience and practicality with covered parking facilities.
name: Beiramar Shopping
address: R. Bocaiúva, 2468 - Centro, Florianópolis - SC, 88015-902, Brazil

excerpt: Paved city oasis shaded by large mature trees with plenty of park benches.
detail_description: Praça XV de Novembro is a charming city oasis in Florianopolis, featuring mature trees and park benches for relaxation. The square is surrounded by significant landmarks such as the Cruz and Sousa Palace, which dates back to the 18th century. Nearby, authentic Luso-Brazilian architecture townhouses can be found on Fernando Machado street. This central location offers access to various amenities including dining, drinking, and entertainment options.
name: Praça XV de Novembro
address: S/N - Centro, Florianópolis - SC, 88010-400, Brazil

excerpt: Modern indoor mall with apparel, groceries, accessories & a food court, plus a cinema.
detail_description: Floripa Shopping is a modern indoor mall located in a prime area with a contemporary architectural design and plenty of natural light. It offers a wide range of stores, including apparel, groceries, and accessories, as well as a diverse food court and entertainment options such as the popular Cinemark cinema. The shopping center is known for its pet-friendly policy and even provides free pet carts for visitors.
name: Floripa Shopping
address: SC-401, 3116 - Saco Grande, Florianópolis - SC, 88032-000, Brazil

detail_description: Armação, a charming coastal village with a rich history as a whaling center in the 18th century, is now a serene destination for travelers. Visitors can explore the picturesque Praia da Armação and immerse themselves in the traditional way of life at Pantano do Sul beach. The area is dotted with quaint cottages and offers an opportunity to interact with friendly locals, making it an ideal spot for those seeking a peaceful retreat by the sea.
name: Armação
address: Florianópolis - State of Santa Catarina, Brazil

excerpt: Santinho is all about the beach, a long stretch known for surfing, backed by dunes, a lagoon, and seafood eateries. Coastal Morro das Aranhas hill features an open-air archaeological museum with ancient rock carvings, and has a steep trail to a viewpoint overlooking the sands. The whole area is dotted with holiday accommodations, including simple guest houses, camping areas, and an upmarket resort.
detail_description: Santinho is a stunning beach known for its surfing opportunities and surrounded by dunes, a lagoon, and seafood restaurants. The area also features the Coastal Morro das Aranhas hill with an open-air archaeological museum showcasing ancient rock carvings and offering a steep trail to a viewpoint overlooking the beach. Visitors can find various accommodation options in the area, including guest houses, camping areas, and an upscale resort.
name: Santinho
address: Florianópolis - State of Santa Catarina, Brazil

excerpt: Dramatic views over downtown Florianópolis & the bay beyond from a hilltop lookout & promenade.
detail_description: Mirante do Morro da Cruz, also known as Morro da Cruz Viewpoint, offers breathtaking panoramic views of downtown Florianópolis and the surrounding bay. Perched atop a hill of the same name, this lookout provides an awe-inspiring vantage point. While the journey up the narrow and steep road may be challenging, it adds to the overall experience.
name: Mirante do Morro da Cruz
address: Av. do Antão, 1900 - Morro da Cruz, Florianópolis - SC, 88025-150, Brazil

detail_description: Perched atop the Majestic Palace Hotel in the heart of Florianopolis, The Roof nightclub offers a stunning bay view and has been a popular nightlife destination since its opening in 2013. Boasting luxurious decor inspired by international rooftop spaces, it's known for its vibrant atmosphere and sophisticated parties on Fridays. The club also houses the Japanese-inspired restaurant Black Sheep.
name: The Roof
address: Av. Beira Mar Norte, 2746 - Centro, Florianópolis - SC, 88015-702, Brazil

excerpt: Freshwater lagoon in a nature park featuring a playground, a bar, snacks, grills & more.
detail_description: Lagoa do Peri is a freshwater lagoon located in the Municipal da Lagoa do Peri Park on the Southern Island of Santa Catarina. The park features various ecosystems including rainforest and restinga, offering environments representing all stages of ecological succession. Visitors can enjoy activities such as stand-up paddleboarding on the calm waters, swimming, and kayaking. The area is also ideal for families with children, as the water remains shallow close to the shore.
name: Lagoa do Peri
address: Rod. Francisco Thomaz dos Santos, 3150 - Morro das Pedras, Florianópolis - SC, 88010-102, Brazil

name: Praia do Gravatá
address: Lagoa da Conceição, Florianópolis - State of Santa Catarina, Brazil

excerpt: Bustling stretch of beach offering golden sands & calm waters, plus resorts, bars & restaurants.
detail_description: Praia de Jurere is a vibrant beach destination known for its lively atmosphere, featuring expansive golden shores and tranquil waters. Visitors can enjoy the convenience of nearby resorts, as well as a variety of bars and restaurants to indulge in.
name: Praia de Jurere
address: Canasvieiras, Florianópolis - State of Santa Catarina, Brazil
